message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a game-changer in its field and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not quite comfortable going as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $950000?
I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $1050000. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my target. Would you be willing to consider $975000?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to get a better price for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $1025000. It's my final concession, and I hope we can wrap up the deal here.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still a bit above my target. Would you be willing to consider $990000?

I'm not going to go any lower than $1050000, Bob. I've made concessions and I'm at my limit. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid we're at an impasse. I'm going to have to consider other options.
